Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.CrossModuleComponent
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Edge
  • public final class Edge
extends CrossModuleComponent
    This class implements an edge of the Social Graph. An edge, in a context, can link the ego of the Contextual Ego Network to one of the alters. Each edge comprises multiple interactions.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis (maniospas@iti.gr), Barbara Guidi (guidi@di.unipi.it), Andrea Michienzi (andrea.michienzi@di.unipi.it)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Interaction addDetectedInteraction​(java.lang.Object data)
      Adds a new interaction with no duration on this edge at the current timestamp.
      Interaction addInteraction​(long timestamp, long duration, java.lang.Object data)
      Creates and adds a new interaction on this edge.
      Node getAlter()
      Retrieve the edge's endpoint that is not the ego of the edge context's ego network if getEgo() finds an ego endpoint.
      Context getContext()
      Retrieves the context the edge belongs to.
      Node getDst()
      Retrieves the destination node of the edge.
      Node getEgo()
      Retrieves the ego node of the edge context's ego network if that ego a member of the edge.
      java.util.ArrayList<Interaction> getInteractions()
      Retrieves a shallow copy of the edge's interaction list.
      Node getSrc()
      Retrieves the source node of the edge.

      • getSrc

        Retrieves the source node of the edge.
        Returns:
        The source node.

      • getDst

        public Node getDst()
        Retrieves the destination node of the edge.
        Returns:
        The destination node.

      • getEgo

        public Node getEgo()
        Retrieves the ego node of the edge context's ego network if that ego a member of the edge.
        Returns:
        The ego node of the edge, null otherwise.

      • getAlter

        public Node getAlter()
        Retrieve the edge's endpoint that is not the ego of the edge context's ego network if getEgo() finds an ego endpoint.
        Returns:
        The alter endpoint of the edge.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the edge doesn't contain the contextual ego network's ego.

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()
        Retrieves the context the edge belongs to.
        Returns:
        The edge's context.

      • addDetectedInteraction

        public Interaction addDetectedInteraction​(java.lang.Object data)
        Adds a new interaction with no duration on this edge at the current timestamp.

        data - The data to be stored in the interaction
        Returns:
        the created interaction

      • addInteraction

        public Interaction addInteraction​(long timestamp,
                                  long duration,
                                  java.lang.Object data)
        Creates and adds a new interaction on this edge.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The start timestamp of the interaction
        duration - The duration of the interaction
        data - The data stored in the interaction
        Returns:
        the created interaction

      • getInteractions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Interaction> getInteractions()
        Retrieves a shallow copy of the edge's interaction list.
        Returns:
        A list of interactions.
